title: Child-and-Parents Relationship Get
description: How to get a child-and-parents relationship.

response.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<fs:familysearch xmlns:gx="http://gedcomx.org/v1/" xmlns:fs="http://familysearch.org/v1/" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">
    <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/PPPX-PP0/changes" rel="change-history" title="Child-and-Parents Relationship Change History"/>
    <fs:childAndParentsRelationship id="PPPX-PP0">
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/PPPX-PP0/notes" rel="child-and-parents-notes" title="Child-and-Parents Relationship Notes"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/PPPX-PP0" rel="child-and-parents-relationship" title="Child-and-Parents Relationship"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/PPPX-PP0/source-references" rel="child-and-parents-source-references" title="Child-and-Parents Relationship Source References"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP3" rel="child" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP1" rel="father" title="Person"/>
        <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP2" rel="mother" title="Person"/>
        <fs:father resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP1" resourceId="PPPX-PP1"/>
        <fs:mother resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP2" resourceId="PPPX-PP2"/>
        <fs:child resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/PPPX-PP3" resourceId="PPPX-PP3"/>
        <fs:fatherFact type="http://gedcomx.org/AdoptiveParent" id="C.1">
            <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/PPPX-PP0/mother/conclusions/C.1" rel="conclusion" title="Child-and-Parents Relationship Conclusion"/>
        </fs:fatherFact>
        <fs:motherFact type="http://gedcomx.org/BiologicalParent" id="C.2">
            <gx:link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/child-and-parents-relationships/PPPX-PP0/mother/conclusions/C.2" rel="conclusion" title="Child-and-Parents Relationship Conclusion"/>
        </fs:motherFact>
    </fs:childAndParentsRelationship>
</fs:familysearch>
